vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.17;
son of: Beriah (H1283);
brother of: Malchiel (H4439);
father of: Japhlet (H3310), Shomer (H7763H), Hotham (H2369) and Shua (H7774)
Group of che.ver (חֶ֫בֶר "Heber" H2268)
§ Heberites = see Heber
descendants of Heber
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Héber; tribu de Aser
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希別族 这个陽性名詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 希別
希別的後裔(民 26:45)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希别族 这个阳性名词在希伯来文的意思是 见 希别
希别的后裔(民 26:45)
